title.narrative: Sri Lanka - Higher Education for the Twenty First Century Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to enhance the capacity of the higher education system, institutions and human resources to deliver quality higher education services in line with economic and social development needs.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 1: A1. | Description :The Ministry of Higher Education shall maintain a project steeringcommittee whose composition is acceptable to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 1: A2. | Description :The Ministry of Higher Education shall be responsible for projectimplementation with the support of the UGC and SLIATE. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 1: A3. | Description :The Ministry of Higher Education shall maintain the Policy Planningand Development Unit with staff and terms of reference satisfactory to IDA for the coordination of national level activities. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 1: A4. | Description :Universities shall be responsible for implementation of Part 2 of theproject: Promoting Relevance and Quality of Teaching and Learning. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 1: B1. | Description :The Ministry of Higher Education shall implement the project inaccordance with the Operations Manual and Environmental Assessment and Management Framework. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 1: B2. | Description :The Ministry of Higher Education shall prepare and implement, in amanner satisfactory to IDA, any environmental management plans required by the Environmental Management Framework. | Frequency:Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 2: B2. | Description :The Ministry of Higher Education shall prepare and submit to IDAquarterly interim unaudited financial reports not later than 45 days after the end of each calender quarter. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section 2: B3. | Description :The Ministry of Higher Education shall submit audited financialstatements covering each fiscal year of the Recipient not later than six months after the end of such period. | Frequency :Yearly
